Input.Description: Just OFFSET LIMIT
Input.Query: SELECT * FROM c OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2

Input.Description: Parameterized OFFSET and LIMIT
Input.Query: SELECT * FROM c OFFSET @OFFSETCOUNT LIMIT @LIMITCOUNT

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT and non partition filter
Input.Query: SELECT * FROM c WHERE c.blah = 5 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2

PartitionedQueryExecutionInfoInternal.RewrittenQuery: SELECT * FROM c WHERE (c.blah = 5) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 3

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT and partition filter
Input.Query: SELECT * FROM c WHERE c.key = 5 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT 0
Input.Query: SELECT * FROM c OFFSET 0 LIMIT 0

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT 0 with partition key filter
Input.Query: SELECT * FROM c WHERE c.key = 5 OFFSET 0 LIMIT 0

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT and partition filter but aggregates
Input.Query: SELECT VALUE COUNT(1) FROM c WHERE c.key = 5 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2

PartitionedQueryExecutionInfoInternal.RewrittenQuery: SELECT VALUE [{"item": COUNT(1)}] FROM c WHERE (c.key = 5)

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT and partition filter but distinct
Input.Query: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM c WHERE c.key = 5 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2

Input.Description: OFFSET LIMIT and partition filter but group by
Input.Query: SELECT c.name FROM c WHERE c.key = 5 GROUP BY c.name OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2

PartitionedQueryExecutionInfoInternal.RewrittenQuery: SELECT [{"item": c.name}] AS groupByItems, {"name": c.name} AS payload FROM c WHERE (c.key = 5) GROUP BY c.name
